name: Trash in the Morning
description:
You are a trash can. This will be your third consecutive month at collection day which would label you the cleanest house on the block. But what's this, the can across the street seems to have the same idea. And their tossing garbage all over your yard! Well two can play at this game! Now it's a race to see who has the least amount of garbage in their yard before the garbage man comes.

Controls:

  • Left control stick - rotate and move forward
  • A button - launch trash bag

*Main menu can only be navigated with mouse

Development:

Kenneth - Design, Programming

Art and Sound belong to their respective makers
